page.title: 11Sport in our area.
page.content: {Canoeing}is a very popular sport in our area.Lots of competitions are held on a stretch of the River Tay just below the old shop.They have a special competition on Easter weekend and sometimes have canoeing during spring, summer and autumn.They have a piece of ground up behind our school and they are putting up chalets for the canoeists to stay in. {Shooting}is also popular.There are often lots of shooters after pheasants That is a very common bird in our area Partridges and pigeons are also shot. We have a{bowling}green in our area where there is a club that practise on Monday,Wednesday and Saturday nights. In Strathtay,which is just outside our area,there is a nine hole golf course.
